name: Hide Social Widgets
description: Hides social media share buttons, follow widgets, and embedded content

rules.css: .fb-like, .fb-share-button, .fb-comments, .fb-page, .twitter-share-button, .twitter-follow-button, .twitter-tweet, .instagram-media, .linkedin-share, .pinterest-pin, [class*='share-button'], [class*='social-share'], [class*='social-buttons'], [class*='share-buttons'], [class*='addthis'], [class*='sharethis'], .addtoany_share, .a2a_kit, iframe[src*='facebook.com/plugins'], iframe[src*='platform.twitter.com'], iframe[src*='instagram.com'], iframe[src*='linkedin.com'] { display: none !important; }
